title._content: [Unidentified cavalry soldier in Union uniform with bugle and sword] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified cavalry soldier in Union uniform with bugle and sword] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 1-51. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Published in: Cavalry : photographs of American Civil War / Harris Andrews ... [et al.]. East Stroudsburg, Pa. : Guidon Press, c1988, p. 31. Published in: Civil War collector's encyclopedia : arms, uniforms, and equipment of the Union and Confederacy / Francis A. Lord. Mineola, N.Y. : Dover Publications, 2004, p. 142. Subjects: United States.--Army.--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Musicians--1860-1870. Bugles--1860-1870. Daggers & swords--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32113 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2793
